title: National Power Outage Duration Predictor
description: Used statistical tests and regression models to predict power outage durations across the U.S. based on environmental and infrastructure factors.

title: Taylor Swift Song Recommender
description: Built a tool using Spotify audio features and Genius lyrics API to recommend songs and enable lyrical search.

title: Image Processing App with KNN Classifier
description: Created an app that classifies images using KNN, RGB processing, and Python’s Pillow and tkinter libraries.

title: Meteorite Data Visualization
description: Visualized NASA meteorite landings using folium maps and statistical analysis to explore global impact trends.

title: AI Waste Sorting Robot
description: Designed a Raspberry Pi-powered robot to detect and sort recyclables using image classification.

title: FIRST Robotics YouTube Crash Course
description: Launched a 106-video series teaching robotics, CAD, and physics, viewed over 74,000 times by global audiences.

title: AI for Conservation Curriculum
description: Co-designed a STEM curriculum focusing on AI and sustainability, now implemented in 10+ schools.

title: Shang Lab GoalEX NLP Research
description: Worked on explainable AI by clustering documents using hierarchical language embeddings and OpenAI APIs.

title: Product Usage Insights for After Hours
description: Analyzed survey and engagement data to identify user retention patterns and inform marketing strategies.

title: FTC Robotics Elective Program
description: Developed and led a full-semester robotics elective in local schools, increasing student interest in STEM.

title: GitHub API Integration
description: Connected GitHub’s API to display real-time profile stats like followers, repos, and gists on portfolio site.

title: World Economic Forecasting with Time Series
description: Led a FinTech project modeling trends across global powers using predictive time series analysis.
